title: Create a Windchill User (Participants)
summary: Add a user account using Participant Administration and place it in initial groups.

steps.label: Open Participant Administration
steps.where: Navigator → Organizations → <Your Org> → Utilities → Participant Administration
steps.verify: A new user creation dialog appears.

steps.label: Enter required details
steps.action: Provide Name (username), Full Name, Last Name; add an email for notifications; set Organization.
steps.verify: The user can be saved without validation errors.
notes: Participant attributes like name/email typically live in your directory service, while Windchill-specific info (teams, ACL) is stored in the WC database.
If not associated with an Organization, the user may end up in the Unaffiliated domain and be harder to find.

steps.label: Set initial password & save
steps.action: Set an initial password (or your org’s provisioning approach) and finish the wizard.
steps.verify: User appears in the Users table.

steps.label: (Optional) Add to admin or starter groups
steps.action: Add Organization Administrator or other seed groups as needed for your environment.
steps.verify: Groups are listed for the user.
